I got this one to work-  (pretty sure this is the one- it's an ISO when it finishes dl'ng)  Am runnin Windows XP SP3.  INstalled original F.E.A.R. 2 game and then mounted ISO  for Reborn.  Chose to install right into the F.E.A.R. 2  folder in the program files directory. Window popped saying that the folder already existed and do i want to install there anyways. Chose yes,  and it installed fine.  Planted the crack and it fired right up.  Can play Project origin or go to mission  menu and can choose Reborn.   Played for abit,  looks cool so far.  Good luck,  will leave seed for 7 days from 1-23-10.
